name: Baarambo
description:
You are special, you have power, and you have to protect the others from terrible danger. Will you be able to become stronger and survive all the enemy's attacks?

To WIN

You need defence Corral and survive 5 evolution levels. Evolution level complered when end monster attack.

Control

AWSD - To move

Mouse - Target and shoot

E - Open corral menu

Escape - Pause and Audio settings

Authors:

  1. PacificBottom - Graphics and Visual
  2. DarkFairy - Music and Sound design
  3. Jimmyster - Code and Gameplay
